Introduction
This topic contains general authorization issues in fiduciary cases, including
outdated fiduciary appointments and certifications
minor beneficiaries with multiple custodial parents
handling
irregularities in the names on documents in the claims folder
, and
a name change for a beneficiary, custodian, or fiduciary
notifying a fiduciary hub (hub) of changes that may impact a fiduciary appointment or require a fiduciary adjustment
handling retroactive awards
between $10,000 and $25,000 to beneficiaries under fiduciary supervision
, and
to beneficiaries under fiduciary supervision that exceed $25,000
regional office (RO) actions after a hub completes the review of a case involving a pending retroactive award that exceeds $25,000
memorandum template to a hub requesting review of a case involving a retroactive award between $10,000 and $25,000
, and
sample memorandum to a hub requesting review of a case involving a pending retroactive award that exceeds $25,000
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section E - Authorizing Awards for Fiduciary Cases
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section E
